> ::Lord Elder::
  > 
  > Elder was about to get worried when the shuttle pilot finally
  > went into action. He had waited untill the last moment to vear 
  > away from the missiles.
  > 
  > Elder quickly spins around to the hatch and fires at the 
  > missiles as they move out to a safe range of detination.
  > 
  > Elder: Nice manuver. I'm seeing two Minions still in the area.
  > Fire whatever this shuttle has at them.
  > 
  > Pilot: Two fusion laser turrets, aye!
  >
  > The shuttle swings into the correct fireing positon and releases 
  > two laser shots at Nightstrike and Darkfate.
   
  OOC: Okay, the above was the last post I have for the area around the ark. The minions that were there: Deepstryke, Phobia, Decibel and Tumult have all been run off by the arrival of the maximal shuttle and an unknown transformer who looks like a black version of Shockblast, but who has no faction identifyer. 
   
  I am going to begin posting for my folks at the area around the Ark probably later this week. However I do not know the actions of Nightstrike and Darkfate, so I will just assume they left the area, unless someone has any objections? 
   
  Oh, and donï¿½t forget Cyclonus and crew were still in route to Earth, they will be arriving shortly as well. (this weekend, if not before)
   
  If anyone has any thoughts or objections or suggestions, please feel free to throw them out here. 
    
  FUN!!!!!
   
  Preston
   

       
--0-428340474-1212619883=:2199
